dialogue.speaker: SECURITY GUARD
dialogue.context: K The Guard glances up as Jacket Man gets into an ELEVATOR.
dialogue.utterance: Crump... I'm sorry, no one by that name.
dialogue.speaker: SECURITY GUARD
dialogue.context: The Security Guard rushes to intercept him.
dialogue.utterance: Hey! You can't go up there!
dialogue.speaker: SECURITY GUARD
dialogue.utterance: We've got an intruder in the express elevator!
